text:
Nicki Minaj teams up again with Ariana Grande for her new music video “Bed.” In the clip, the rapper and pop star unite at the ocean, and are joined by two men, played by Odell Beckham Jr. and Brad Wing, on daybeds. Nicki and Ariana have collaborated several times on music in the past, such as on the 2014 single “Band Bang” With Jessie J on Ariana’s 2016 track “Side to Side” and the song “The Light Is Coming,” which was also released last month. The single “Bed” was released in June. Check out the ladies new video below.

Editorial credit: JStone / Shutterstock.com
title: Nicki Minaj And Ariana Grande Reunite For Mermaid-Themed “Bed” Video
